data: On a certain day in November, in the early afternoon, if you had just parked your car at Kenney’s burger place in Buena Vista, Virginia, or maybe you were walking into Nick’s Italian Kitchen or Todd’s Barbecue, you might have cast your gaze up the hill toward Parry McCluer High School.
November | Kenney’s burger place | Buena Vista | Virginia | Nick’s Italian Kitchen | Todd’s Barbecue | Parry McCluer High School
